analyzed: chu'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams /
translated: The water element is not other than emptiness.ðŸ”½Emptiness itself is the water element.

original: chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The water element itself is emptiness.

original: me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang me'i khams ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang me'i khams med /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang me'i khams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang me'i khams med /
translated: The emptiness of the fire element is not the fire element.ðŸ”½Apart from emptiness there is no fire element.

original: me'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams /
analyzed: me'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams /
translated: Apart from the fire element there is no emptiness.ðŸ”½Emptiness itself is the fire element.

original: me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The fire element itself is emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the wind element is not the wind element.

original: rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rlung gi khams ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rlung gi khams med /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rlung gi khams ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rlung gi khams med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no wind element.

original: rlung gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams /
analyzed: rlung gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams /
translated: Apart from the wind element there is no emptiness.ðŸ”½Emptiness itself is the wind element.

original: rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The wind element itself is emptiness.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang nam mkha'i khams ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang nam mkha'i khams med /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang nam mkha'i khams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang nam mkha'i khams med /
translated: The emptiness of the space element is not the space element.ðŸ”½Apart from emptiness there is no space element.

original: nam mkha'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the space element there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams /
translated: Emptiness is the space element.

original: nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The space element is emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes @224b pa'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes @224b pa'i khams ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the consciousness element is not the consciousness element.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the consciousness element there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams; rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams; rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the consciousness element. The consciousness element is emptiness.

original: ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ma rig pa ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ma rig pa med /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ma rig pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ma rig pa med /
translated: The emptiness of ignorance is not ignorance.ðŸ”½Apart from emptiness there is no ignorance.

original: ma rig pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa /
analyzed: ma rig pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa /
translated: Apart from ignorance there is no emptiness.ðŸ”½Emptiness is ignorance.

original: ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Ignorance is emptiness.

original: 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of volitional factors is not volitional factors.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du byed  nyid med; 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du byed  nyid med; 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Formations are not other than emptiness, and emptiness is not other than formations.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed /
translated: Formations themselves are emptiness,

original: 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med /
analyzed: 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med /
translated: and emptiness itself is formations.ðŸ”½The emptiness of consciousness is not consciousness, and consciousness is not other than emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Consciousness itself is emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa /ðŸ”½rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ming dang gzugs ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ming dang gzugs med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ming dang gzugs ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ming dang gzugs med /
translated: and emptiness itself is consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de; stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de; stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs /
translated: The emptiness of name and form is not name and form, and name and form are not other than emptiness.

original: ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Name and form themselves are emptiness,ðŸ”½and emptiness itself is name and form.

original: skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang skye mched drug ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud @225a *//ðŸ”½na'ang skye mched drug med /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang skye mched drug ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud @225a *// na'ang skye mched drug med /
translated: The emptiness of the six sense sources is not the six sense sources.ðŸ”½The six sense sources are not other than emptiness.

original: skye mched drug las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug /
analyzed: skye mched drug las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the six sense sources.ðŸ”½The six sense sources are emptiness.

original: skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the six sense sources.

original: reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg pa ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang reg pa med /
analyzed: reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang reg pa med /
translated: The emptiness of contact is not contact.ðŸ”½Contact is not other than emptiness.

original: reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than contact.

original: stong pa nyid kyang reg pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang reg pa /
translated: Emptiness is contact.ðŸ”½Contact is emptiness.

original: reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshor ba med /
analyzed: reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshor ba med /
translated: The emptiness of sensation is not sensation.ðŸ”½Sensation is not other than emptiness.

original: tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba /
analyzed: tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba /
translated: Emptiness is not other than sensation.ðŸ”½Emptiness is sensation.

original: tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Sensation is emptiness.

original: sred pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sred pa ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sred pa med /
analyzed: sred pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sred pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sred pa med /
translated: The emptiness of craving is not craving.ðŸ”½Craving is not other than emptiness.

original: sred pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang sred pa /
analyzed: sred pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang sred pa /
translated: Emptiness is not other than craving.ðŸ”½Craving is emptiness.

original: sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is craving.

original: len pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang len pa ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang len pa med /
analyzed: len pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang len pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang len pa med /
translated: The emptiness of grasping is not grasping.ðŸ”½Grasping is not other than emptiness.

original: len pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang len pa /
analyzed: len pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang len pa /
translated: Emptiness is not other than grasping.ðŸ”½Grasping is emptiness.

original: len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is grasping.

original: srid pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang srid pa ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang srid pa med /
analyzed: srid pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang srid pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang srid pa med /
translated: The emptiness of becoming is not becoming.ðŸ”½Becoming is not other than emptiness.

original: srid pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang srid pa /
analyzed: srid pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang srid pa /
translated: Emptiness is not other than becoming.ðŸ”½Becoming is emptiness.

original: srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is becoming.

original: skye ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang skye ba ma yin /
analyzed: skye ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang skye ba ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of birth is not birth.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang @225b skye ba med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang @225b skye ba med /
translated: Nor is there arising outside of emptiness.

original: skye ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: skye ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Nor is there emptiness outside of arising.

original: stong pa nyid kyang skye ba /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang skye ba /
translated: Emptiness is also arising.

original: skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Arising is also emptiness.

original: rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rga shi ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rga shi med /
analyzed: rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rga shi ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rga shi med /
translated: The emptiness of aging and death is not aging and death.ðŸ”½Nor is there aging and death outside of emptiness.

original: rga shi las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang rga shi /
analyzed: rga shi las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang rga shi /
translated: Nor is there emptiness outside of aging and death.ðŸ”½Emptiness is also aging and death.

original: rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med /
analyzed: rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med /
translated: Aging and death are also emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of generosity.ðŸ”½Nor is there the perfection of generosity outside of emptiness.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Nor is there emptiness outside of the perfection of generosity.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa; sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa; sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the perfection of generosity, and the perfection of generosity is emptiness.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med /
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of morality is not the perfection of morality.ðŸ”½The perfection of morality is not other than emptiness.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the perfection of morality.ðŸ”½Emptiness is the perfection of morality.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of morality is emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the perfection of patience is not the perfection of patience.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med /
translated: The perfection of patience is not other than emptiness.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the perfection of patience.

original: stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa /
translated: The perfection of patience is emptiness.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the perfection of patience.

original: brtson @226a *// 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med /
analyzed: brtson @226a *// 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med /
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of perseverance is not the perfection of perseverance.ðŸ”½The perfection of perseverance is not other than emptiness.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the perfection of perseverance.ðŸ”½The perfection of perseverance is emptiness.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of concentration is not the perfection of concentration.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med; bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med; bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no perfection of meditative stability, and apart from the perfection of meditative stability there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
translated: Also, the perfection of meditative stability is not other than emptiness, and emptiness is not other than the perfection of meditative stability.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of meditative stability is emptiness.ðŸ”½Emptiness is the perfection of meditative stability.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med /
translated: Also, the perfection of wisdom is not other than emptiness,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
translated: and emptiness is not other than the perfection of wisdom.ðŸ”½The perfection of wisdom is emptiness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang nang stong pa nyid ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang nang stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang nang stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang nang stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of internal phenomena is not the emptiness of internal phenomena.ðŸ”½Apart from emptiness there is no emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang nang @226b stong pa nyid /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang nang @226b stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of internal phenomena there is no emptiness.ðŸ”½Emptiness is the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena is emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang phyi stong pa nyid ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang phyi stong pa nyid mad /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang phyi stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang phyi stong pa nyid mad /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of external phenomena is not the emptiness of external phenomena.ðŸ”½Apart from emptiness there is no emptiness of external phenomena.

original: phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of external phenomena there is no emptiness.ðŸ”½Emptiness is the emptiness of external phenomena.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of external phenomena is emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of internal and external phenomena is not the emptiness of internal and external phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid med /
translated: Also, emptiness is not other than the inner and outer.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid /
translated: Also, the inner and outer is not other than emptiness.ðŸ”½Emptiness is also the inner and outer.

analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The inner and outer is also emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of emptiness is also not emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med /
translated: Also, emptiness of emptiness is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Also, emptiness is not other than the emptiness of emptiness.ðŸ”½Emptiness is also the emptiness of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chen po stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chen po stong pa nyid ma yin /

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chen po stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chen po stong pa nyid med /

original: chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /

original: stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid /

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is also the emptiness of the great.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid med /

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang don @227a *// dam pa stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is also emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the emptiness of the conditioned is not the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid /

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is also not the emptiness of the unconditioned.ðŸ”½Apart from emptiness there is no unconditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the unconditioned there is no emptiness.ðŸ”½The unconditioned is also the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med /
translated: Emptiness is also the unconditioned.ðŸ”½The emptiness of that which is beyond extremes is also not that which is beyond extremes.ðŸ”½Apart from emptiness there is no that which is beyond extremes.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /

original: stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is also emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the conditioned is also emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the conditioned is also emptiness.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is also emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the unconditioned is also emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the limitless is also emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the limitless is also emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is also emptiness.

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med /ðŸ”½thog ma dang tha ma @227b med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med / thog ma dang tha ma @227b med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is also emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the non-apprehension of things is also emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the non-apprehension of things is also emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of essential nature is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid /

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the non-apprehension of the beginning, middle, or end is also emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of non-dispersal

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than non-rejectable emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid /

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid med /
translated: Emptiness is also non-rejectable emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the emptiness of intrinsic nature is not the emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /

original: stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid /

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the emptiness of all phenomena.

analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid med; chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /

original: stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid /

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med /ðŸ”½rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid @228a *//
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid @228a *//
translated: The emptiness of the defining characteristics of all phenomena is not the emptiness of the defining characteristics of all phenomena.ðŸ”½Apart from emptiness, there are no defining characteristics of all phenomena.

analyzed: las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid /

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med /

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid /

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med /

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid /

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is emptiness.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med /

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid /

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med /

analyzed: dngos @228b po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid /

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //

analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /

analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams med /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams med /

analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the right efforts there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba /

original: yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin /

original: stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa /

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //

analyzed: dbang po rnams las gud na'ang stong pa @229a *// nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang dbang po //

original: dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //

analyzed: stobs lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang stobs rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stobs rnams med /

analyzed: stobs rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang stobs /
translated: Apart from the powers there is no emptiness.ðŸ”½Emptiness is also the powers.

original: stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The powers are also emptiness.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the seven limbs of enlightenment is not the limbs of enlightenment.ðŸ”½Apart from emptiness there are no limbs of enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag /
translated: Apart from the limbs of enlightenment there is no emptiness.ðŸ”½Emptiness is also the limbs of enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The limbs of enlightenment are also emptiness.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the noble eightfold path is not the noble eightfold path.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no noble eightfold path,ðŸ”½and apart from the noble eightfold path there is no emptiness.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de; stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de; stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa /
translated: Emptiness is the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin /
translated: and the noble eightfold path is emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the four noble truths is not the four noble truths,

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med /ðŸ”½'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: and apart from emptiness there are no four noble truths.ðŸ”½Apart from the four noble truths there is no emptiness.

original: stong @229b pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa /
analyzed: stong @229b pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa /
translated: Emptiness is the four noble truths,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan rnams ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan rnams ma yin /
translated: and the four noble truths are emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the meditative stabilities is not the meditative stabilities,

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bsam gtan rnams med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bsam gtan rnams med /
translated: and apart from emptiness there are no meditative stabilities.

original: bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the meditative concentrations.

original: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan /
translated: The meditative concentrations are emptiness.

original: bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the meditative concentrations.

original: tshad med pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshad med pa rnams ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshad med pa rnams med /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshad med pa rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshad med pa rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the four immeasurables is not the immeasurables.ðŸ”½The immeasurables are not other than emptiness.

original: tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the immeasurables.ðŸ”½The immeasurables are emptiness.

original: tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
translated: Emptiness is the immeasurables.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the four formless absorptions is not the formless absorptions.ðŸ”½The formless absorptions are not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med /ðŸ”½gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med /ðŸ”½gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the formless absorptions.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa /
translated: Emptiness is also the formless meditative absorptions.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The formless meditative absorptions are also emptiness.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par thar pa med /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par thar pa med /
translated: The emptiness of the eight deliverances is not the deliverances.ðŸ”½The deliverances are not one thing and emptiness another.ðŸ”½There are no deliverances apart from emptiness.

original: rnam par thar pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa /
translated: Emptiness is not one thing and the deliverances another.

original: rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½mthar gyis gnas pa'i @230a *//ðŸ”½snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // mthar gyis gnas pa'i @230a *// snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med /
translated: Emptiness is the deliverances.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the nine serial steps of meditative absorption is not the serial steps of meditative absorption.ðŸ”½The serial steps of meditative absorption are not one thing and emptiness another.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: There are no serial steps of meditative absorption apart from emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams /
translated: the emptiness of the successive stages of meditative absorption,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: and the successive stages of meditative absorption themselves are emptiness.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the gate of liberation that is emptiness, the gate of liberation that is signlessness, and the gate of liberation that is wishlessness is not the gate of liberation that is emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no gate of liberation that is emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the gate of liberation that is emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa /
translated: Emptiness is the gate of liberation that is emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the gateway to liberation that is emptiness, the gateway to liberation that is signlessness, and the gateway to liberation that is wishlessness is also emptiness.

original: mngon par shes pa drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mngon par shes pa rnams med /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mngon par shes pa rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the six superknowledges is also not the superknowledges.ðŸ”½The superknowledges are not other than emptiness.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams @230b las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams @230b las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the superknowledges.ðŸ”½The superknowledges are emptiness.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams med /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the meditative stabilizations is also not the meditative stabilizations.ðŸ”½The meditative stabilizations are not other than emptiness.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the meditative stabilizations.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams /
translated: The meditative stabilizations are emptiness.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The meditative stabilities themselves are emptiness.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways is not the dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams med /ðŸ”½gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams med / gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from emptiness there are no dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways.ðŸ”½Apart from the dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams /
translated: Emptiness is not the dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin /
translated: The dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways themselves are emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of the ten powers of the tathÄgatas is not the ten powers of the tathÄgatas.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med /ðŸ”½de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from emptiness there are no ten powers of the tathÄgatas.ðŸ”½Apart from the ten powers of the tathÄgatas there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs /
translated: Emptiness is not the ten powers of the tathÄgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The powers of the tathÄgatas themselves are emptiness.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams med /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the four fearlessnesses is also not the fearlessnesses,ðŸ”½and the fearlessnesses are also not emptiness.ðŸ”½Apart from emptiness there are no fearlessnesses,ðŸ”½and apart from the fearlessnesses there is no emptiness.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong @231a *// pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong @231a *// pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa /
translated: Emptiness is also the fearlessnesses,

original: mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: and the fearlessnesses are also emptiness.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is also not the detailed and thorough knowledges,ðŸ”½and the detailed and thorough knowledges are also not emptiness.ðŸ”½Apart from emptiness there are no detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa /
translated: and apart from the detailed and thorough knowledges there is no emptiness.ðŸ”½Emptiness is also the detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: and the detailed and thorough knowledges are also emptiness.

original: byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang byams pa chen po ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byams pa chen po med /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang byams pa chen po ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byams pa chen po med /
translated: The emptiness of great loving kindness is not great loving kindness.ðŸ”½Great loving kindness is not other than emptiness.

original: byams pa chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po //
analyzed: byams pa chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po //
translated: Emptiness is not other than great loving kindness.ðŸ”½Emptiness is great loving kindness.

original: byams pa chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //ðŸ”½snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang snying rje chen po ma yin /
analyzed: byams pa chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang snying rje chen po ma yin /
translated: Great loving kindness is emptiness.ðŸ”½The emptiness of great compassion is not great compassion.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang snying rje chen po med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang snying rje chen po med /
translated: Great compassion is not other than emptiness.

original: snying rje chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: snying rje chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than great compassion.ðŸ”½Emptiness is great compassion.

original: stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po; ;snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po; ;snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Great compassion is emptiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas is not the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med /
translated: The distinct attributes of the buddhas are not other than emptiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos @231b ma 'dres pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos @231b ma 'dres pa /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the distinct attributes of the buddhas.ðŸ”½The distinct attributes of the buddhas are emptiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the distinct attributes of the buddhas.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin /ðŸ”½stong pa nyid las gud na'ang thams cad shes pa nyid med /ðŸ”½thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang thams cad shes pa nyid med / thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: The emptiness of the understanding of all is not the understanding of all.ðŸ”½The understanding of all is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang thams cad shes pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang thams cad shes pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the understanding of all.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the understanding of all.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the understanding of the aspects of the path is not the understanding of the aspects of the path.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no knowledge of the aspects of the path.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the knowledge of the aspects of the path there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is the knowledge of the aspects of the path.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of the aspects of the path is emptiness.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /

translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //

translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not existent because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality,ðŸ”½the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //

translated: the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

translated: The applications of mindfulness are the applications of mindfulness,ðŸ”½and so on up to:ðŸ”½the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.ðŸ”½The ten powers of a tathÄgata are the ten powers of a tathÄgata,ðŸ”½and so on up to:ðŸ”½the knowledge of all aspects is the knowledge of all aspects.ðŸ”½The perfection of giving is the perfection of giving,ðŸ”½and so on up to:
